overview: Nostalgia hits hard in this last record of the great musician Gabriel Messer in the series "Messer In Concert," in an attempt to keep the dream alive, "tutu" intends to immortalize the last moments of an 17 years life experience on the return of the incredible musician to the castle that originated the series.  Last Video from the series "Messer In Concert", recorded between the years 2017 and 2019.
title: Messer Back At The Castle
